evidence_reviewed.title: Velocity API Data Structure Analysis
evidence_reviewed.notes: Internal analysis of real Velocity API responses. High confidence.

evidence_reviewed.title: Q3 Full Sync Validation
evidence_reviewed.notes: 100% sync success across 17 brokers, 10000+ deals. Very high confidence.

wlnk_analysis.rationale: E1 analyzed sample data; E2 validated full production sync. E1 is the weaker evidence due to smaller sample size during initial analysis.

congruence_penalty.rationale: Both evidence items are CL3 (same context - internal empirical testing). No cross-context transfer penalty needed.

bias_check.pet_idea_notes: H1 was the conservative approach, not a novel or favored idea. Selected based on objective deduction.
bias_check.nih_notes: Considered 4 alternative hypotheses (H1-H4). H2/H3 remain viable for future enhancements. H4 rejected on technical merit.

risks: Weakest Link: E1 API analysis (CL3). No penalty applied. R_eff: 0.90 (HIGH). Bias: LOW. Schema may need future migrations for undiscovered enum codes.
recommendation_notes: H1 has sufficient evidence for L2 status. R_eff of 0.90 exceeds threshold for production decision. Ready for Q5 decision phase.
